basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Harrison Hedley Way Endowed Scholarship for Educational Leadership
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Harrison Hedley Way Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a graduate degree in Education Leadership. Eligibility Requirements Student pursuing a graduate degree in Education Leadership Minimum 3.0 GPA Demonstrate through a personal statement, a desire to continue working in the Oklahoma Public School System as a school administrator Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Educational Leadership   or SIS_Major is Educational Administration
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Educational Leadership   or SIS_Major is Educational Administration
